issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I want to use two variations of the Helvetica Neue font in my app, namely "medium italics" and "thin italics". They are contained in a separate .otf files. 
Both fonts have the same fontFamily property, thus it is not possible to tell Titanium which variation I want to use, as setting fontWeight to "light", or "medium" doesn't have any effect.
fields.summary: Can't use two custom fonts from the same fontFamily, where first font's "weight" differs from the second one's

comments.body:
In order for us to progress this issue, edit your ticket to include a proper [Use-case|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-CreatingGoodUsecases].

Include a permanent link to a zipped archive of the fonts (or state if this is not possible).

State your environment, including Titanium SDK version (including date + commit hash), and the Android versions for emulator and device.

Please read the [Submitting Bug Reports|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-SubmittingBugReports] guide before raising tickets.

Thank you
No response from user after request for information. Marking resolved.
